title: rustc segmentation fault

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

labels.name: ICEBreaker-LLVM
labels.description: Bugs identified for the LLVM ICE-breaker group

body:
TLDR: rustc segfaults if you compile autocxx:

> $ rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.51.0-nightly (44e3daf5e 2020-12-31)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 44e3daf5eee8263dfc3a2509e78ddd1f6f783a0e
commit-date: 2020-12-31
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.51.0-nightly
> rustc 1.51.0-nightly (44e3daf5e 2020-12-31)
> $ cargo --version --verbose
cargo 1.50.0-nightly (75d5d8cff 2020-12-22)
release: 1.50.0
commit-hash: 75d5d8cffe3464631f82dcd3c470b78dc1dda8bb
commit-date: 2020-12-22
> $ git clone https://github.com/google/autocxx --depth 1
> $ cd autocxx/demo
> $ cargo build
> ...
> error: could not compile `autocxx-demo`
> 
> Caused by:
>   process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name autocxx_demo --edition=2018 demo/src/main.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=16aa58ac615e31ca -C extra-filename=-16aa58ac615e31ca --out-dir /home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/deps --extern autocxx=/home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/deps/libautocxx-5764a21f2c081756.rlib --extern cxx=/home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/deps/libcxx-5e5d0b573d59c1d9.rlib -L native=/home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/build/autocxx-demo-c59a4d655bdad450/out -l static=autocxx-demo -l stdc++ -L native=/home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/build/cxx-b7e40aeaf705160f/out -L native=/home/volker/cloned/autocxx/target/debug/build/link-cplusplus-de28d3bdd966afa5/out` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference)
